branchCategory.name: Silencers & Exhaust Cleaners
branchCategory.description: <p>The high noise reduction style silencers keeps the noise level inside a plant below 85dB(A) with a noise reduction effect of 40dB(A). Exhaust cleaners insure clean plant air and reduce noise pollution over &nbsp;35dB. The AMC series also removes over 99.9% of oil mist.</p>

branchItem.name: ANA1/ANB1
AN
branchItem.description: <P>Series AN silencers offer various styles and low back pressure in a compact, easy mounting design. The noise reduction has been improved to 30 dB(A) and the case is UL94-V0 grade, flame resistant material. Series AN is available with M, R or NPT threads. </P>

branchItem.name: AMC
AMP
VCHN
branchItem.description: SMC's VCHN silencer is rated for high pressure of up to 5.0MPa. A double-layer filtration structure results in less clogging of the silencer's element, and by simply removing a bolt, the sound absorbing material can be replaced without removing the silencer. The VCHN has a built-in safety valve, which will activate when the silencer's internal pressure exceeds 1.8MPa. At a supply pressure of 4.0MPa, back pressure 2.0MPa, the VCHN provides a 35dB(A) noise level reduction. A freeze reduction option is available.&nbsp;

branchItem.name: AMV
